attributes.action: Disolve parliament and form an emergency coalition government on the grounds that bribery, incompetence, corruption and patronage have made the Government no longer fit for purpose.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent revelations regarding loss of data, due to staggering incompetence and failure to understand even the most basic rules of IT security.  The receit of donations where the name of the donor has delibrately been falsified.  A government which has no idea how many people have entered the country either legally of illegally is not fit for any purpose whatsoever.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
